titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat regional income tax collection agencies as States for purposes of confidentiality and disclosure requirements relating to tax returns and return information.

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat regional income tax collection agencies as States for purposes of confidentiality and disclosure requirements relating to tax returns and return information.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to treat certain public entities jointly formed and operated by two or more municipalities for the purpose of collecting income tax as states for purposes of applying confidentiality and disclosure requirements relating to tax returns and return information.
